typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.ResultInfo
typeDescription.description: Meta-information on the retrieved search result

featureDescription.name: relevance
featureDescription.description: Relevance of the result; a metric between [0,1]

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The name of the data source.

featureDescription.name: documentId
featureDescription.description: ID of the document (specific to data source)

featureDescription.name: isLast
featureDescription.description: Whether this is the last search result

featureDescription.name: ansfeatures
featureDescription.description: A set of answer features that should be inherited by all answers generated from this result.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.Passage
typeDescription.description: Interesting passages of the search result that will be examined in more detail.

featureDescription.name: features
featureDescription.description: A set of features of this passage. Unmatched features need not be present, and order does not matter. Duplicates are also perfectly normal (e.g. multiple matching clues will generate copies of a feature) and are summed together.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: Score of the passage regarding relevance likelihood.

featureDescription.name: ansfeatures
featureDescription.description: A set of answer features that should be inherited by all answers generated from this passage.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.PassageFeature
typeDescription.description: A feature matched on a particular passage. This type is for sub-classing to particular features.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Feature value. Unmatched features are assumed 0. Ideally, the feature value should be in the interval of [0,1], but this is not enforced.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.PF_ClueMatch
typeDescription.description: Passage Feature: A clue matched. Value is fixed to 1.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.PF_ClueWeight
typeDescription.description: Passage Feature: A clue matched. Value is the (solr-used) weight of the clue.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.PF_AboutClueMatch
typeDescription.description: Passage Feature: An "about" clue matched (i.e. a clue that also matches the document title; suggests lower signal). Value is fixed to 1.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.PF_AboutClueWeight
typeDescription.description: Passage Feature: An "about" clue matched (i.e. a clue that also matches the document title; suggests lower signal). Value is the (solr-used) weight of the clue.

featureDescription.name: features
featureDescription.description: A set of features of this answer, see CandidateAnswerTypes.

featureDescription.name: passage
featureDescription.description: The passage this answer belongs to. (Or one of them.)

featureDescription.name: base
featureDescription.description: The annotation (or one of them) that eventually spawned this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.SearchResult.QuestionLATMatch
typeDescription.description: Match of a question LAT; this is data for essentially a super-rough TyCor that expects the type word near the answer text.
